# Aortic Stenosis

|                                                 | Mild   | Moderate | Severe |
|-------------------------------------------------|--------|----------|--------|
| Peak jet velocity (m/s)                         | \< 3.0 | 3.0-4.0  | \>4.0  |
| Mean gradient (mm Hg)                           | \< 25  | 25-40    | \>40   |
| Aortic valve area (cm^2^)                       | \>1.5  | 1.0-1.5  | \<1.0  |
| Valve area index (cm^2^ /m^2^)                  |        |          | \<0.6  |
| Outflow track velocity-to-aortic valve velocity |        |          | \<0.25 |

: Classification of Aortic Stenosis
